summary: The Defense Shipyard Workforce Housing Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Defense to study the feasibility, costs, and benefits of providing housing for civilian workers at specific naval shipyards (Norfolk, Pearl Harbor, Portsmouth, and Puget Sound). The study will assess construction costs, potential workforce benefits (recruitment/retention), implementation feasibility, operational effects, payment options, and comparisons to other housing models. A report to Congress detailing the findings is due within 18 months of the Act's enactment.
